text: James Steven Abrahams (May 10, 1944 â€“ November 26, 2024) was an American movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Shorewood, Wisconsin. His career began in 1976 and he retired in 2019. He was known for directing and writing spoof movies such as Airplane!, The Naked Gun and Hot Shots! movies. Abrahams died on November 26, 2024 at his home in Santa Monica, California from leukemia at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Movie directors from Wisconsin Category:Movie producers from Wisconsin Category:Screenwriters from Wisconsin Category:Writers from Milwaukee Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Cancer deaths in California
title: Jim Abrahams
